title: Spark Hire to Exhibit Video Interviewing Solutions at the NAPS 2015 Conference
text:
Make your way to booth #6 for a comprehensive look at Spark Hire’s video interviewing platform and to learn how their solutions can enhance your recruiting efforts!
Chicago, IL (PRWEB) September 25, 2015
Spark Hire ( http://www.sparkhire.com ), the world’s leading video interviewing company, will showcase its recruiting solutions at the NAPS 2015 Conference in Boston, MA on September 28-30.
“The Spark Hire team and I are very excited about returning to the NAPS 2015 Conference and are looking forward to sharing with everyone the great developments we’ve made to our platform since last year’s event,” says Spark Hire CEO, Josh Tolan. “We’re working with even more companies worldwide and helping them quickly make more personal connections with the top-notch talent that their clients want and need.”
Spark Hire will be giving demonstrations of their video interviewing platform and highlighting features such as:
 One-Way Video Interviews : These interviews allow candidates to record short video answers to a recruiter’s interview questions. Members of the recruiting team can share these videos with clients who will appreciate being involved in the interview process right from the start. Live Video Interviews : These interviews allow candidates to connect face-to-face via webcam with a recruiter. The interviews are also recorded and easily accessible for playback and sharing. Sharing these videos with colleagues gives them better insight into a candidate so a collective decision can be made efficiently. Candidate Showcase : Spark Hire’s Candidate Showcase feature makes it easy for recruiting professionals to share a visual shortlist of candidates with clients. Clients can submit a review on each candidate to efficiently provide feedback, thus, speeding up placement. Meet the Spark Hire team at booth #6 where they will provide conference attendees with a close look at their platform’s amazing features and tips on how to supercharge your recruiting.
About Spark Hire:
Spark Hire is the fastest growing video interviewing platform in the world and leader in video interviews for staffing firms. Offering a completely branded one-way and recorded live video interview platform, Spark Hire enables staffing and recruiting firms to connect faster with amazing talent, edge out competitors not utilizing the technology, and improve overall client collaboration. No contracts, no setup fees. Unlimited video interviews. For more information, visit sparkhire.com .
About NAPS
Since 1961, NAPS has been a leading industry educator in the United States. As the oldest association representing the search, recruiting and staffing industry, NAPS offers the longest and most comprehensive history of professional credentialing in the industry. NAPS continues to maintain the esteemed position as the industry educator through its certification program, continuing education initiatives, eNewsletters and its annual conference. For more information on NAPS, visit http://www.naps360.org .
